quotes.quote: A man who has been the indisputable favorite of his mother keeps for life the feeling of a conqueror.
The capacity of any conqueror is more likely than not to be an illusion produced by the incapacity of his adversary.
The conqueror is regarded with awe; the wise man commands our respect; but it is only the benevolent man that wins our affection.
Conquerors never, never conquer a nation to bring freedom. They brought control.
Excellent conquerors do not engage.
There are not fifty ways of fighting, there is only one: to be the conqueror.
Love is the great conqueror of lust.

To conquer, we must destroy our enemies. We must not only die gallantly; we must kill devastatingly. The faster and more effectively you kill, the longer you will live to enjoy the priceless fame of conquerors.
Modern conquerors can kill, but do not seem to be able to create. Artists know how to create but cannot really kill. Murderers are only very exceptionally found among artists.

If conquerors be regarded as the engine-drivers of History, then the conquerors of thought are perhaps the pointsmen who, less conspicuous to the traveler's eye, determine the direction of the journey.
Any conqueror in human history has always been ultimately someone who exists purely for the expansion of their own ego, through amounting more.
The inactivity of a conqueror betrays the loss of strength and blood.
A man may conquer a million men in battle but one who conquers himself is, indeed, the greatest of conquerors.
History would be boring without conquerors, bloodthirsty warlords and saviors.
It is the right of war for conquerors to treat those whom they have conquered according to their pleasure.
The greatest conqueror wins without struggle.
The truth comes as conqueror only because we have lost the art of receiving it as guest.
Vengeful conquerors burn books as if the enemy's souls reside there, too.
Never be a victim of life; be its conqueror.
Conquerors fight their own battles.
The conqueror is always a lover of peace; he would prefer to take over our country unopposed.
They were conquerors, and for that you want only brute force--nothing to boast of, when you have it, since your strength is just an accident arising from the weakness of others.
No man is such a conqueror, as the one that has defeated himself.
The conqueror writes history, they came, they conquered and they write. You don't expect the people who came to invade us to tell the truth about us.
The man who masters his own soul will forever be called conqueror of conquerors.
Life yields only to the conqueror. Never accept what can be gained by giving in. You will be living off stolen goods, and your muscles will atrophy.
The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror.
Death makes no conquest of this conqueror: For now he lives in fame, though not in life.
Thank you, Lord, that You are the Conqueror and that You want to make us more than conquerors.
Kill one man and you're a murderer, kill a million and you're a conqueror.
